Jean-Baptiste Guiffard

Home Research Teaching CV

Post-doc at Telecom-Paris (Institut Polytechnique de Paris)

Associate Researcher at UMR Développement & Sociétés (Université Paris 1 Panthéon-Sorbonne, IRD)

My research interests are in digital economics, with a particular focus on development economics. My thesis provides three impact evaluations of broadband internet deployment on various outcomes (political mobilization, house market, firms’ choice of location…). I am also interested in the economics of industrial organization.

I hold a PhD in Economics at UMR Développement & Sociétés (Université Paris 1 Panthéon-Sorbonne).

  • Member of the International Telecommunications Society
  • Member of the AFEDEV network
  • Co-organizer of the AuToMat Seminar
  • Co-organizer of the Journée d’études sur les données spatiales
